description: A small, serpentine dragon with scales that glisten like emeralds. Despite its size, the Venomfang Hatchling is highly venomous, often found lurking in dark, damp caves, waiting to ambush unsuspecting prey.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The Venomfang Hatchling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
